title: Change

docs.instructions:
# Instructions

Determine the fewest number of coins to give a customer so that the sum of their values equals the correct amount of change.

## Examples

- An amount of 15 with available coin values [1, 5, 10, 25, 100] should return one coin of value 5 and one coin of value 10, or [5, 10].
- An amount of 40 with available coin values [1, 5, 10, 25, 100] should return one coin of value 5, one coin of value 10, and one coin of value 25, or [5, 10, 25].

require 'minitest/autorun'
require_relative 'change'

class ChangeTest < Minitest::Test
  def test_change_for_1_cent
    # skip
    expected = [1]
    assert_equal expected, Change.generate([1, 5, 10, 25], 1)
  end

  def test_single_coin_change
    skip
    expected = [25]
    assert_equal expected, Change.generate([1, 5, 10, 25, 100], 25)
  end

  def test_multiple_coin_change
    skip
    expected = [5, 10]
    assert_equal expected, Change.generate([1, 5, 10, 25, 100], 15)
  end

  def test_change_with_lilliputian_coins
    skip
    expected = [4, 4, 15]
    assert_equal expected, Change.generate([1, 4, 15, 20, 50], 23)
  end

  def test_change_with_lower_elbonia_coins
    skip
    expected = [21, 21, 21]
    assert_equal expected, Change.generate([1, 5, 10, 21, 25], 63)
  end

  def test_large_target_values
    skip
    expected = [2, 2, 5, 20, 20, 50, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100]
    assert_equal expected, Change.generate([1, 2, 5, 10, 20, 50, 100], 999)
  end

  def test_possible_change_without_unit_coins_available
    skip
    expected = [2, 2, 2, 5, 10]
    assert_equal expected, Change.generate([2, 5, 10, 20, 50], 21)
  end

  def test_another_possible_change_without_unit_coins_available
    skip
    expected = [4, 4, 4, 5, 5, 5]
    assert_equal expected, Change.generate([4, 5], 27)
  end

  def test_a_greedy_approach_is_not_optimal
    skip
    expected = [10, 10]
    assert_equal expected, Change.generate([1, 10, 11], 20)
  end

  def test_no_coins_make_0_change
    skip
    assert_empty Change.generate([1, 5, 10, 21, 25], 0)
  end

  def test_error_testing_for_change_smaller_than_the_smallest_of_coins
    skip
    assert_raises(Change::ImpossibleCombinationError) do
      Change.generate([5, 10], 3)
    end
  end

  def test_error_if_no_combination_can_add_up_to_target
    skip
    assert_raises(Change::ImpossibleCombinationError) do
      Change.generate([5, 10], 94)
    end
  end

  def test_cannot_find_negative_change_values
    skip
    assert_raises(Change::NegativeTargetError) do
      Change.generate([1, 2, 5], -5)
    end
  end
end
